title: Golang: How To Use the Go Install Command
author: Jack Wallen
description: Want to run your Go program as a full executable binary? The Go install command compiles and installs the application in your workspace's bin directory. Here's how.
cntitle: Go 语言：如何使用 Go Install 命令
cndescription: 想要将 Go 程序作为完整的可执行二进制文件运行？Go install 命令会在工作区的 bin 目录中编译并安装应用程序。方法如下。
